item.title: How to Enable Profile Photos in Jetstream
item.description: Profile photos are a great way to personalize your application! They make user profiles more engaging and ensure everyone has a recognizable avatar when creating or commenting on posts. If you’re using Jetstream and want to enable custom profile photos, here’s a simple guide to get you started.
